text:
Insert an image using BXE into a page in the default publication, give it a
title, save and exit. Open the same page in forms editor, edit the object and
the following message appears:

RELAX NG Validation failed:
/usr/local/jakarta-tomcat-5.0.18/webapps/lenya/lenya/pubs/default/work/editor/authoring/tutorial/index_en.xml.validate.unnumber:49:77:
error: attribute "href" not allowed at this point; ignored 

Object tag as it appears in BXE:
<object data="tutorial/insert_link.png" href="" title="screen shot"/>
creator: ps@nomensa.com
ps@nomensa.com
text:
Looks good I believe

Edited http://olr.kbs.uni-hannover.de:8888/default/authoring/q.html in kupu
Added a small picture, 
Clsoed Kupu
opened it up in forms editor and edited it, now shows correct html which can be
edited and saved
